title: Time and Forever
description: When a leaf fall from the tree what exist between the ground and the fall is time.and time never shows any mercy,This is the way we fall. First we lose our balance, teetering precariously on the edge of uncertainty, until, mercilessly, gravity takes over.

title: Lost and never returned
description: You're making me write in a dark lonely November night. With the thoughts that my brain tries so hard to hide. Lost and never found, never returned home! in the first light of day my empty home lay quiet. Your voice sound in my head so clear I feel like you're just over there.

title: Parallel Universe
description: This painting - A parallel word I imagine to be with you Ma and Baba, so colorful and heavenly.

title: Parallel Ocen Sky
description: This painting - A parallel word I imagine to be with you Ma and Baba, so colorful and heavenly.
